akn:section.akn:heading: Definition of tribally controlled postsecondary career and technical institution

akn:content.akn:p: § 1861. Definition of tribally controlled postsecondary career and technical institution In this subchapter, the term “tribally controlled postsecondary career and technical institution” has the meaning given the term in section 2302 of title 20. (Pub. L. 95–471, title V, § 501, as added Pub. L. 110–315, title IX, § 941(j)(1), Aug. 14, 2008, 122 Stat. 3463.)
